item.title: [Resolved] Known Issue: Discourse Emails
item.description: Due to a misconfiguration that occurred during a routine restore of the database for our Discourse Forums, registered users may have recieved unwanted email notifications over the last 24 hours. This issue has now been resolved and we apologise for any inconvenience caused.
item.content:
Due to a misconfiguration that occurred during a routine restore of the database for our Discourse Forums, registered users may have recieved unwanted email notifications over the last 24 hours.

This issue has now been resolved and we apologise for any inconvenience caused.
